page.title: 08Circus Comes to South-Inch.
page.content: The{Robert Brothers Circus}was started by two brothers called Bobby and Tommy about{36 years ago.}Now it is a very well known travelling circus.It has 60 employees who range from artistes to tradesmen such as electricians.They have 30 animals but some were at Blackpool. It takes time and patience to train them we were told.{The Big {Top}which used to be made of canvas is now{plastic}and made in{Italy.}It can hold up to 3000 spectators.The touring season is from{March-December}with 2 months break. The circus has had a {permanent}school{teacher}for 18 mths. Although the school day is as long as ours their teacher said their{educa- {tion}did{suffer}by being{on the move. The most popular days are the first day and Saturday and although the Perth attendences are reasonable the most popular venue is Leeds.
